<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 12"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Blink Blade](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2455)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Conjuration" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=33" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
<trait label="Teleportation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=156" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Firebrands](/Sources.aspx?ID=196) pg. 84 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Price** 1,750 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Base Weapon** [Dagger](/Weapons.aspx?ID=3)
</row>

**Access** Second-mark members of the Firebrands have access to this item.

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

The blade of this _+2 [striking](/Equipment.aspx?ID=280) [dagger](/Weapons.aspx?ID=3)_ is etched with whirling portals, and a single blue sapphire adorns its hilt. It feels lightweight and is always slightly warm to the touch.

**Activate** <actions string="Two Actions" /> Interact;  **Frequency** once per day;   **Effect** You cast [_dimension door_](/Spells.aspx?ID=69). The space you leave and the one you appear in are filled with puffs of smoke that make anyone within [concealed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=4) until they leave the smoke or until the end of your next turn, at which point the smoke dissipates. When used in strong winds, the smoke disperses immediately.

**Activate** <actions string="Reaction" /> envision;  **Frequency** once per day; **Trigger** Your melee attack roll with the _blink blade_ is a critical success;  **Effect** You and your target teleport to a space within 10 feet. The target arrives in a safe, open space of your choosing adjacent to your arrival space. This teleportation also creates puffs of smoke, as noted with the activation above.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
